website_summaries.verdict: Smaller and less costly than other Furby toys, but just as adorable. However, it's more of an add-on than a standalone Furby.
pros: Syncs with app for virtual adventures
Small and cute with various fur patterns available
cons: To get the most out of this purchase, you also need to own a Furby Boom - an additional expense
Some parents find the noises it makes irritating

customer_reviews.title: She liked it but I think after a couple days she ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave it as a gift for my 10 y.o. daughter. She liked it but I think after a couple days she was bored. Other than making a couple noises when you press its head, it doesn't do anything else. The only cool thing is that after being recognized by the real Furby and the app, it will update the app to its "crystal" version, which is much nicer. I bought it when it was $10, so I guess it was fine. I recommend buying it only if you enjoy playing the app.
customer_reviews.author: E. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Furby Baby!
customer_reviews.text: The kids love it - I think it's creepy as a zombie in a nightmare sequence. It does not "talk" to you like the Furby will - you have to press its head to make it speak. The Furby Boom, however, will respond to this creepy little gremlin.
customer_reviews.author: vlosq

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and simple...
customer_reviews.text: Cute and funny -- much less complicated than the Furby Boom. It just has one button on top that makes it talk/make noises. I got one for my 2 year old son because he was so jealous of my 5 year old daughter's Furby Boom. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Cute addition to your Furby Boom
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and says its mommy or daddy Furby's name if you pair them. They don't evolve like the big Furby's so it'd be nice if they said a few more than just 5 things but I like that you can play with them using the free Furby Boom app.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Five

customer_reviews.title: Gets played with a lot
customer_reviews.text: I think it's annoying, but my kids love it and play with it constantly. So I gave it 4 stars for them :)
customer_reviews.author: Pinkavicious

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves it and her dad hates it. I secretly fear it. So I can say it came quickly and in furby condition, all as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Just what I ordered ...exactly as described. Son will be so excited to have another one to add to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly CTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved it, i think it's a bit gimmicky thou ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it, i think it's a bit gimmicky thou it's not really worth more than 12$ that i paid on black friday sale
customer_reviews.author: John Dorian

customer_reviews.title: Great lil Furby!
customer_reviews.text: This cute lil Furby arrived quickly and was as stated and a good price. The kiddo's love it!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Mama

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little extra and get the boom.
customer_reviews.text: Kind of wish I had've gone for two furby boom rather than one and the furbling. Does not interact with the furby boom as much as I thought it would.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Kind of lame but the kid's seem to think they are cute so we're happy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J. Kurlinski

customer_reviews.title: Too cute
customer_reviews.text: The little Furblings are absolutely adorable, a perfect gift for my girls.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn G

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The girls loved them. That interacted with the furby boom.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves this product. Very cute and works with her bigger Furby.
customer_reviews.author: Boo Global

customer_reviews.title: It's pocket size cuteness, alright!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is cute alright! Not at all like the furby but a good addition to the furby. You have to push the button on its head for it to talk but it has a good variety of sounds to say. Its beak doesn't move like the furby but still very cute.
customer_reviews.author: A. Marquez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect friend for a Ferby
customer_reviews.text: Such a cute toy to pair with a furby. My daughter loves the interaction between the ferby and furbling. Its compatible with the app and its a fun accessory.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kern

customer_reviews.title: My nine children love theirs.
customer_reviews.text: This is the Pinnacle of human achievement. There will never exist a greater creature than the Pink/Blue Furbling. Buy this for your friends, family, enemies, or in-laws. My nine children love theirs. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Gillian

product_meta.title: Furby Furblings Creature Plush, Pink/Blue
product_meta.description: A whole new generation of Furby creatures is about to hatch, and they need you to take care of them! This Furblings creature has a mind of its own, but it needs your love and care. You won't do it alone, though, because it will share a special connection with your Furby Boom creature (sold separately). Put the two of them together and watch as your Furblings creature talks - and your Furby Boom creature answers! Raise your little Furblings baby right and have loads of fun doing it! You can also download the free Furby Boom app and unlock a virtual Furblings creature to add to your collection. Get virtual eggs and hatch and raise your Furblings on your mobile device (sold separately)! The Furby app is optional and works with Apple devices, including the iPhone, iPad and iPod touch, and select Android devices. Check Furby.com for device compatibility. Furby and all related characters are trademarks of Hasbro. iPad, iPod touch and iPhone are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries.
feature_bullets: Furblings creature is the next generation of Furby creatures
Furblings creature responds to your Furby Boom creature (sold separately)
The free Furby app lets you hatch and raise virtual Furblings
Play a virtual version of your Furblings creature in the app
Includes one Furblings creature and instructions

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars50 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
